class.name: AudioStreamPlaybackPolyphonic
class.description: Playback instance for [AudioStreamPolyphonic]. After setting the [code]stream[/code] property of [AudioStreamPlayer], [AudioStreamPlayer2D], or [AudioStreamPlayer3D], the playback instance can be obtained by calling [method AudioStreamPlayer.get_stream_playback], [method AudioStreamPlayer2D.get_stream_playback] or [method AudioStreamPlayer3D.get_stream_playback] methods.

method.name: is_stream_playing
method.description: Return true whether the stream associated with an integer ID is still playing. Check [method play_stream] for information on when this ID becomes invalid.

method.name: play_stream
method.description: Play an [AudioStream] at a given offset, volume, pitch scale, playback type, and bus. Playback starts immediately. The return value is a unique integer ID that is associated to this playback stream and which can be used to control it. This ID becomes invalid when the stream ends (if it does not loop), when the [AudioStreamPlaybackPolyphonic] is stopped, or when [method stop_stream] is called. This function returns [constant INVALID_ID] if the amount of streams currently playing equals [member AudioStreamPolyphonic.polyphony]. If you need a higher amount of maximum polyphony, raise this value.

method.name: set_stream_pitch_scale
method.description: Change the stream pitch scale. The [param stream] argument is an integer ID returned by [method play_stream].

method.name: set_stream_volume
method.description: Change the stream volume (in db). The [param stream] argument is an integer ID returned by [method play_stream].

method.name: stop_stream
method.description: Stop a stream. The [param stream] argument is an integer ID returned by [method play_stream], which becomes invalid after calling this function.

constants.constant: Returned by [method play_stream] in case it could not allocate a stream for playback.
